name: GUAR_NOTIF_HX
description: This table stores notifications sent to this guarantor.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PP_PROPOSED_MONTHLY_AMT
columns.description: If the guarantor meets the restrictions for setting up payment plans from MyChart, this column will store the proposed monthly amount that will be shown if they were to sign up for a payment plan.

columns.name: PP_PROPOSED_NUM_PMTS
columns.description: If the guarantor meets the restrictions for setting up payment plans from MyChart, this column will store the proposed number of payments that will be shown if they were to sign up for a payment plan.

columns.name: NOTIF_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the MyChart record that the notification was sent to.

columns.name: INITIATING_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who initiated the notification.

columns.name: INITIATING_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
